---
title: Interactive plotting
---

```{python}
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.io as pio
df = px.data.iris()
fig = px.scatter(df,
    x="sepal_width",
    y="sepal_length",
    color="species",
    marginal_y="violin",
    marginal_x="box",
    trendline="ols",
    template="simple_white")
fig.show()
```
